attributes.action: Give Boughton St Paul's the chance to become a 1/2 Form Entry Primary School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to formally propose that Boughton St Paul's School be returned to a 1/2 form entry primary school. This is the only city centre school left in Chester.  Don't close our 150 year old school.
